DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Screen-Time Regulations Childcare Centers - Aim 3
DOC.detailed_description: Pause Play ( Aim 3 ) objective achieve series taskforce focus group meeting administer Mayor 's Healthy City Initiative ( MHCI ) . Meetings include monthly meeting MHCI advisory board compose community stakeholder focus group childcare center director parent . Stakeholders create dissemination implementation plan leverage finding project . We plan conduct 2-3 focus group 8-10 parent childcare director , total 16-30 participant . Participation focus group part study last approximately 1 day .
